title: VIP Account Verification on BALL
subtitle: Ready to sell your property? Verify your account now! Follow the steps below to complete your VIP account setup on BALL.

steps.title: Account Setup
steps.description: Once you have created an account, you will need to enter your company information

steps.title: Navigating the Steps
steps.description: Click on steps directly or use the sidebar menu to navigate to the preferred step

steps.title: Company Information
steps.description: Enter your company's details including the name, address, and other relevant information.

steps.title: Bank Information
steps.description: Provide your bank details for transactions, including the bank name, account number, and account name

steps.title: Signatories
steps.description: List the authorized signatories for your company, including their names and contact details.

steps.title: Certificates
steps.description: Upload any necessary certificates or documents required for account verification.

steps.title: Account Verification
steps.description: Please note that the verification will take up to 24 - 48 hours. You will receive an email notification once your account has been verified.

steps.title: Start Exploring!
steps.description: Congratulations! Your BALL account is now set up and ready to use.
